net.sourceforge.aglets.util.gui
Class WindowManager

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.event.WindowAdapter
      net.sourceforge.aglets.util.gui.WindowManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.WindowFocusListener, java.awt.event.WindowListener, java.awt.event.WindowStateListener, java.util.EventListener
public class WindowManager
extends java.awt.event.WindowAdapter

This class is used to manager window events (e.g., closing events) for a set of windows (at least one). It could manage more than one window at time, thus to avoid a lot of object creation.

Author:
Luca Ferrari - cat4hire@users.sourceforge.net 10/set/07
